name: Aaron's Rod
shortDescription:
The Budding Staff That Confirmed Divine Election Aaron's Rod is one of the most remarkable relics in biblical tradition, a dead wooden staff that
   ...
fullDescription:
The Budding Staff That Confirmed Divine Election Aaron's Rod is one of the most remarkable relics in biblical tradition, a dead wooden staff that
                    miraculously sprouted, bloomed, and bore fruit overnight as a divine sign confirming Aaron's
                    selection as High Priest of Israel. This miracle silenced those who challenged the authority
                    of Moses and Aaron, establishing the Levitical priesthood with irrefutable divine attestation.

properties.name: Owner
properties.value: Aaron, First High Priest of Israel

properties.name: Location
properties.value: Kept within the Ark of the Covenant
